Live impression!

ONE MAN DOWN - Bio

Passion

We are an aspiring band located in the Netherlands trying to follow our passion for creating music.

Melancholic and Hopefull

With our piercing lyrics we hope to give you a glimpse into both our dark melancholic and bright hopefull views on the aspects of life.

Emotions

We try to inscribe and visualise the emotions we feel in these moments into our songs.

Made with Love

We hope to take you along on our journey of creating this new self-made genre of music!

ONE MAN DOWN - Members

vocals: Lukas Alofs

bass & vocals: Timo Mulder

guitar: Jonathan Mateman

guitar: Mathijs De Maeyer

drums: Stan van Uden
